title: What's The Best Tank Top Laner?
body:
I main Jayce at the moment with over 1400 games on him across my 9 different accounts. I was wanting to get a second champion for higher elo that is, well, tanky. 

I dont think Jayce would work well as a Tank, but I will try it out sometime. But what are the current meta tanks? Or are tanks not good anymore? Mostly what I find people playing top lane nowadays is Jax, Fiora, Kennen, Riven, and Darius. Not any true tanks like Poppy/Naut. 

What do you think?

replies.body: Shen is alright. So is Poppy.
I was thinking about doing Shen or Poppy. But they both have 48% winrate so idk :/
galio, don't bother with anyone else
i always play garen top and seem to do alright but ive heard he is utter trash in high elo

> [{quoted}](name=reaperteaser,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xcAMEabR,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-06-18T12:46:50.046+0000)
>
> i always play garen top and seem to do alright but ive heard he is utter trash in high elo

garen is not a tank. there are only a few true tanks in LoL, and most of them are better jungle.
Best ap tank is galio best ad tank is malph best drain tank is swain.
